publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-839# Dennis Canavan: Safety Belts on School Buses-That the Parliament believes that the Scottish Executive should ensure greater standards of safety in school transport by drawing up a phased timetable, with appropriate targets, so that all buses contracted by local education authorities to carry children between school and home and on school trips will be fitted with seatbelts. Supported by: Alex Neil*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
